commit.message:
Auto merge of #6783 - avitex:add-opendns-ident, r=giraffate

Add OpenDNS to `doc-valid-idents`

changelog: This commit adds `"OpenDNS"` to doc-valid-idents to avoid `doc_markdown` false positives.
